enb_long_title: Eighth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: The conclusions (FCCC/SBI/2002/L.14) recommend that in future all references to Parties in COP decisions should follow the language of the UNFCCC, for example 'Parties included in Annex I,' 'Parties included in Annex II' and 'Parties not included in Annex I.
